Text: 192k Audio in a 6Mb Video ? Seriously, whoever encoded it needs to know how to encode a movie in the first place.
And you should know that the original audio of the film was mono, like mnost of the films of that period. The original Criterion Blu-Ray audio is flac, and 192 kbps is perfectly ok for the audio.
please, if you are able to upload a rip of a blu ray of this this film then do it! :)
